profile.imageProtectionDescription: Control how your images are protected from unauthorized use
profile.enableWatermarkDescription: Adds a semi-transparent CreateSpot logo to the corner of your uploaded images
profile.watermarkWarningDescription: Watermarks are applied when you upload. To remove or change the watermark position, you'll need to re-upload your image from the original file. Keep your original files safe!
profile.preventDownloadsDescription: Makes it harder to right-click and save images (determined users can still find ways around this)
profile.preventAITraining: Request AI models not train on my work
profile.preventAITrainingDescription: Adds signals to your images requesting AI companies exclude them from training data (major AI companies generally respect this)
profile.protectionSettingsFailed: Failed to save protection settings. Please try again.
profile.protectionDisclaimer: Note: These protections are deterrents, not absolute prevention. Determined users can still screenshot or use developer tools.
profile.emailPreferencesDescription: Choose which emails you want to receive from Prompts
profile.emailOnFavoriteDescription: Get notified whenever someone favorites one of your submissions.
profile.emailFeatureUpdatesDescription: Occasional updates about new features, exhibits, and community news.
profile.emailOnBadgeAwardDescription: Get notified when you earn a new badge for your achievements.

profile.tutorialSettingsDescription: Control how hints and tutorials appear throughout the app
profile.enableTutorialsDescription: Show helpful hints to guide you through the app
profile.resetTutorialsDescription: Reset all tutorials to see hints again from the beginning

profile.didYouKnowProfilesDescription: Every user has a profile that includes settings and a portfolio. To get to your portfolio you can start at your profile or you can bookmark your portfolio to get to it directly.
profile.didYouKnowManagePortfolioDescription: Here's where you can manipulate your portfolio to add, remove or change the order of your work

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage prompts, users, and exhibits for the Create Spot community.
dashboard.managePromptsDescription: Create and manage weekly creative prompts. Set three-word prompts with date ranges and track submissions.
dashboard.manageUsersDescription: View and manage user accounts. Monitor user activity and handle account administration tasks.
dashboard.manageExhibitsDescription: Create and curate exhibits. Organize submissions into themed collections and manage exhibit content.

prompts.title: Manage Prompts

prompt.title: Weekly Prompts | Create Spot
prompt.description: Challenge yourself with three new words every week. Create photos, artwork, or writing inspired by the prompts and share your unique interpretation.
prompt.pickWordDescription: Pick any word that sparks your imagination and create something unique ‚Äî a photo, artwork, poem, or story.
prompt.noActivePrompt: No active prompt this week. Check back soon!
prompt.startCreatingDescription: Submit your interpretation of this week's words
prompt.thisWeekGalleryDescription: See how others interpreted the same words
prompt.yourHistoryDescription: View all your past prompt submissions
prompt.readyToCreateDescription: Sign in to submit your interpretation, track your history, and join our creative community.
prompt.justBrowsingDescription: Explore this week's submissions and see how others brought these words to life.
prompt.chooseWordDescription: Pick one that sparks your imagination ‚Äî or challenge yourself with all three!
prompt.createSomethingDescription: Take a photo, make art, write a poem. There's no wrong way to interpret it.
prompt.shareDiscoverDescription: Submit to the gallery and see how others brought the same words to life.
prompt.thinkAbstractlyDescription: The word "light" could mean sunlight, feeling light-hearted, or even enlightenment.
prompt.combineWordsDescription: Try creating one piece that incorporates multiple prompt words for an extra challenge.
prompt.useWhatYouHaveDescription: You don't need fancy equipment. A phone camera or simple writing is perfect.
prompt.addExistingWorkDescription: If you have portfolio pieces that fit the prompt, you can link them directly!

play.noActivePromptDescription: There's no prompt available this week. Check back soon!

thisWeek.noActivePromptDescription: There's no prompt available this week. Check back soon!
thisWeek.noSubmissionsYet: No submissions yet. Be the first to share your interpretation!

upload.ownershipNotice: You retain all rights to your content. Create Spot has no rights to your submissions.
upload.watermarkEnabled: Watermark will be applied to uploads.

terms.title: Terms of Service | Create Spot
terms.description: Terms of Service for Create Spot - a creative community platform.

contentOwnership.title: Content Ownership
contentOwnership.paragraph1: You retain all rights, title, and interest in any content you upload, submit, or post to Create Spot, including but not limited to images, text, artwork, and other creative works (collectively, "Your Content").
contentOwnership.paragraph2: Create Spot does not claim any ownership rights in Your Content. By uploading or submitting content to Create Spot, you do not grant Create Spot any ownership, license, or rights to Your Content beyond what is necessary to provide and operate the service.
contentOwnership.paragraph3: You grant Create Spot a limited, non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to display, store, and distribute Your Content solely for the purpose of operating the Create Spot platform and providing services to you and other users. This license terminates when you remove Your Content from the platform.
contentOwnership.paragraph4: You may remove Your Content from Create Spot at any time. Upon removal, Create Spot will cease displaying Your Content, subject to reasonable technical delays and any cached or archived copies that may exist for a limited time.
contentOwnership.paragraph5: You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights, licenses, and permissions to upload and share Your Content on Create Spot, and that Your Content does not infringe upon the rights of any third party.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.paragraph1: You are responsible for all content you upload, submit, or post to Create Spot.
userResponsibilities.paragraph2: You agree not to upload, submit, or post content that:
userResponsibilities.bullet1: Violates any applicable laws or regulations
userResponsibilities.bullet2: Infringes upon the intellectual property rights of others
userResponsibilities.bullet3: Contains harmful, abusive, or offensive material
userResponsibilities.bullet4: Violates the privacy or rights of others
userResponsibilities.paragraph3: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities that occur under your account.

serviceUsage.title: Service Usage
serviceUsage.paragraph1: Create Spot provides a platform for users to share creative work, build portfolios, and participate in weekly creative prompts.
serviceUsage.paragraph2: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time, with or without notice.
serviceUsage.paragraph3: We may remove content that violates these Terms or our community guidelines, but we are under no obligation to monitor or review user content.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.paragraph1: Create Spot is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
limitationOfLiability.paragraph2: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Create Spot shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of the service.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.paragraph1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated terms on this page.
changesToTerms.paragraph2: Your continued use of Create Spot after any changes to these Terms constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraph1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the appropriate channels.

home.title: Create Spot
home.description: A creative community for artists and writers to share their work, build portfolios, and participate in weekly creative prompts.
home.heroDescription: A home for photographers, painters, illustrators, writers, sculptors, and anyone else who wants to create. Build your portfolio, share your creative journey, and get inspired by weekly prompts.
home.exhibitsDescription: Explore all exhibits ‚Äî browse, orbit in 3D, and travel the globe.
home.promptsDescription: Three words a week. Pick one and create something new.
home.yourPortfolioDescription: Turn your creative work into a portfolio you can share.

global.exhibitHintDescription: Exhibits are carefully curated collections of creative work from our community. Explore different perspectives and get inspired by what others have created.
global.creatorHintDescription: Follow creators to stay updated with their latest work and see how their creative journey evolves over time.
global.critiqueDidYouKnowDescription: Critiques let you give and receive detailed feedback on creative work. Creators can enable critiques on their submissions, and you can edit your critiques until the creator sees them.

about.title: About | Create Spot
about.description: Learn why Create Spot exists, how portfolios and sharing work, and how weekly prompts connect to your creative journey.
about.mainDescriptionSuffix: to help creatives stay inspired, share their work in thoughtful ways, and grow a body of work that feels alive.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Create Spot exists to give creatives
purpose.exhibit: exhibit their work in interesting ways
purpose.weBelieve: We believe creative energy grows when it is
purpose.overTime: Over time, we will keep building
purpose.building: new ways to inspire and new ways to share

organization.title: How the site is organized
organization.youCanBuild: You can build it over time,
organization.curate: curate the pieces that represent you best
organization.shareResults: , and share the results when you want to be seen. When you submit new work, it becomes
organization.sharedPublicly: and can be shared publicly through the exhibitions and galleries.
organization.learnMore: Learn more about portfolios and sharing ‚Üí

promptInspiration.soInspiration: , so your inspiration and your body of work

badges.title: Badges
badges.description: Celebrate your creative journey with badges that recognize your achievements.
badges.automaticallyAwarded: Badges are automatically awarded when you

aboutPurpose.title: Purpose | Create Spot
aboutPurpose.description: Why creative work matters in an automated world, and how observation, awe, and creation keep us human.
aboutPurpose.mainDescription: In a world where automation is everywhere, what we make is proof that we are still here, still feeling, still paying attention.

whyCreationMatters.title: Why creation matters now
whyCreationMatters.description: As automation becomes more prevalent, the value of our work is not just in output but in
whyCreationMatters.ourPerspective: . Our perspective, emotion, and lived experience make technology worthwhile. The tools can scale, but

aweKeepsUsAlive.title: Awe keeps us alive
aweKeepsUsAlive.description: Awe belongs in everyday life. It is the spark that makes us look closer, feel deeper, and
aweKeepsUsAlive.thingsInspire: . The things that inspire us are essential, and the

creativeCycle.title: The creative cycle
creativeCycle.cycleDescription: is a cycle that makes life worth living. Each feeds the next, and the loop gets stronger when we share our work and support each other. Let's keep that cycle going together.

aboutPromptSubmissions.title: Prompt Submissions | Create Spot
aboutPromptSubmissions.description: Learn how prompt submissions work, including text and image options, titles, and how to clear or remove submissions.
aboutPromptSubmissions.mainTitle: Build a prompt submission your way.
aboutPromptSubmissions.mainDescription: Each prompt is flexible: share visuals, text, or both, and decide what you want the community to see.

whatYouCanSubmit.title: What you can submit
whatYouCanSubmit.fullDescription: If you upload an image, it becomes the primary visual in the gallery. If you submit text without an image, it appears as a text card. When you include both, the image leads while the text is shown alongside the full submission view.

titlesInGallery.title: Titles in the gallery
titlesInGallery.fullDescription: to your submission. That title appears in the gallery and on the submission detail page, helping viewers understand your intent at a glance.

clearingRemoving.title: Clearing and removing submissions
clearingRemoving.fullDescription: whenever you want to refine what you share. This makes it easy to refresh your prompt entries without losing momentum.

aboutPortfolios.title: Portfolios & Sharing | Create Spot
aboutPortfolios.description: Learn how sharing levels work, how portfolio links and previews are generated, and how to feature your work on Create Spot.
aboutPortfolios.mainTitle: Share your work with the right audience.
aboutPortfolios.mainDescription: Portfolios let you collect your work, control visibility, and share links with confidence. Here's how the system works in detail.

sharingLevels.title: Sharing levels
sharingLevels.description: Every portfolio item uses a share status so you can decide
sharingLevels.privateDescription: Only you can see it in your profile editor.
sharingLevels.profileDescription: Visible on your public profile, but not in galleries.
sharingLevels.publicDescription: Visible on your profile and in public galleries.
sharingLevels.note: Note: if you link a portfolio item to a prompt, it becomes
sharingLevels.noteSuffix: so it can appear with other prompt submissions.

portfolioLinks.title: Portfolio links and preview images
portfolioLinks.fullDescription: and each individual piece has its own shareable link at
portfolioLinks.previewDescription: When you share your profile link, we automatically generate a preview image that highlights your work. If you have a featured image that is shareable, it becomes the preview. Otherwise we build a grid from your most recent portfolio images.

featuredWork.title: Featured work
featuredWork.fullDescription: in your profile settings to spotlight a single piece at the top of your profile. Featured work also powers your profile preview image as long as it is set to

promptsAndPortfolios.title: Prompts and portfolios together
promptsAndPortfolios.description: Prompt submissions can be added to your portfolio, and portfolio pieces can be linked to prompts. This keeps your weekly inspiration connected to your long-term body of work while maintaining a single, consistent archive.

aboutBadges.title: Badges | Create Spot
aboutBadges.description: Learn about badges on Create Spot - how they work, what badges are available, and how to earn them.
aboutBadges.mainDescription: Badges recognize your achievements and milestones in the Create Spot community. Earn them by creating, sharing, and engaging with others.

howBadgesWork.title: How badges work
howBadgesWork.description: Badges are automatically awarded when you reach certain milestones in your creative journey. They are
howBadgesWork.emailNotification: You'll receive an email notification when you earn a new badge.

aboutBadges.howToEarnAspiringCreator: Add your first portfolio item to your profile. Portfolio items are works you showcase in your personal collection.
aboutBadges.howToEarnPromptPioneer: Submit your first work to a weekly prompt. Pick any word from the three-word prompt and create something inspired by it.
aboutBadges.howToEarnFeaturedVoice: Receive your first critique on one of your submissions. Enable critiques on your work to allow others to provide feedback.
aboutBadges.howToEarnArtfulEye: Write your first critique on someone else's work. Share thoughtful feedback to help creators grow and improve.

focalPoint.description: Click anywhere on the image to set the focal point. This determines which part of the image will be centered when displayed in constrained spaces.

welcome.title: Welcome, {name} üëã
welcome.message1: We're thrilled to have you in the {appName} community.
welcome.permanentCollection: Explore the permanent collection on the gallery grid or discover artists on the global map.
welcome.exhibits: Discover curated exhibits that showcase themed collections and highlight exceptional work from the community.
welcome.portfolio: Build and manage your portfolio over time. Curate the pieces that represent you best and share them when you want to be seen.
welcome.promptGame: Finally, join the weekly prompt inspiration game. Each week we share a new three-word brief to spark creativity‚Äîuse it to create something new or connect an existing portfolio piece that fits the theme.
welcome.subject: Welcome to {appName}

newPromptNotification.subject: New prompt: {word1} / {word2} / {word3}
newPromptNotification.title: New Prompt Available!
newPromptNotification.greeting: A new creative prompt is ready for you!
newPromptNotification.greetingWithName: Hey {name}, a new creative prompt is ready for you!
newPromptNotification.description: Pick any word that sparks your imagination and create something unique ‚Äî a photo, artwork, poem, or story. Share your interpretation with the community!
